title: Spiced Pumpkin Seeds

preparations.content: Preheat oven to 325°F. Line a baking sheet with parchment and set aside.

Place cinnamon, ginger, nutmeg, salt, allspice, chili powder and cloves into mixing bowl and grind <b>30 sec/speed 10<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and grind a further <b>30 sec/speed 10<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add pumpkin seeds, maple syrup and coconut oil and mix <b>5 min/212°F//speed <b>. Transfer to prepared baking sheet and spread out evenly with spatula.
Bake for 20-25 minutes (325°F) stirring half way through baking to ensure even cooking. Let cool before serving.

hintsAndTricks: Omit salt if using salted pumpkin seeds.

To roast pumpkin seeds from a pumpkin: scoop out seeds from pumpkin, place seeds in a large bowl of water, seeds will float to top and pulp will sink. Discard pulp, pat seeds dry and proceed with recipe.
